title: Draft follow-up emails after meetings
description: Use Copilot to turn meeting notes into personalized follow-up emails for attendees.
prompt_template:
Based on these meeting notes: [paste notes here]

Draft a follow-up email to each attendee summarizing their action items and next steps. Keep it professional and under 150 words per email.

title: Create meeting prep briefs
description: Generate a one-page briefing before client calls with key context and talking points.
prompt_template:
I have a meeting with [client/company name] about [topic]. Here's what I know: [paste context]

Create a one-page meeting prep brief with: 1) Key facts about them 2) Suggested talking points 3) Questions to ask 4) Potential objections and responses.

title: Summarize CRM data into insights
description: Turn raw CRM data into actionable sales insights and trends.
prompt_template:
Here is my sales pipeline data: [paste data or summary]

Identify: 1) Top 3 opportunities at risk 2) Deals that have been stagnant longest 3) Recommended follow-up actions for each.

title: Draft proposal sections
description: Use AI to write proposal sections based on your requirements and past wins.
prompt_template:
I need to write a proposal section for [product/service]. Key points: [paste]. Our differentiators: [paste]. Target client: [paste].

Draft a 200-word section that emphasizes value and addresses common objections.

title: Research prospect before outreach
description: Quickly research a company or contact to personalize your outreach.
prompt_template: Research [company name] and [contact name if known]. Provide: 1) Company overview and recent news 2) Likely pain points for their industry 3) Personalization angles for a cold outreach email.

title: Draft LinkedIn connection messages
description: Create personalized connection requests that get accepted.
prompt_template:
I want to connect with [name] on LinkedIn. They work at [company] as [role]. Our mutual connection is [if any]. I'm reaching out because [reason].

Draft 3 short, personalized connection request options under 300 characters.

title: Create blog post outlines
description: Generate SEO-friendly blog outlines from a topic and keywords.
prompt_template: Create a blog post outline for: [topic]. Target keywords: [keywords]. Tone: [professional/casual]. Include: intro, 4-5 main sections with H2s, key points for each, CTA.

title: Draft social media posts
description: Generate engaging social posts from a blog or announcement.
prompt_template: Create 3 social media posts (LinkedIn, X/Twitter, LinkedIn carousel) from this content: [paste]. Each should have a hook, key insight, and CTA. Vary the angle for each platform.

title: Analyze campaign performance
description: Summarize campaign metrics and suggest optimizations.
prompt_template: Here are my campaign metrics: [paste data]. Analyze: 1) What's working 2) What's underperforming 3) Top 3 optimization recommendations with expected impact.

title: Write email subject lines
description: Generate A/B test subject lines for email campaigns.
prompt_template: Create 5 email subject line options for: [campaign purpose]. Audience: [description]. Tone: [urgency/curiosity/value]. Keep under 50 characters. Include one question and one with numbers.

title: Summarize competitor content
description: Quickly analyze competitor blogs or content for insights.
prompt_template: Summarize this competitor content: [paste or link]. Extract: 1) Main arguments 2) Gaps we could address 3) Content angles we could create in response.

title: Create ad copy variations
description: Generate multiple ad copy options for testing.
prompt_template: Create 4 ad copy variations for [product/service]. Target: [audience]. Value prop: [paste]. Include headlines and body copy. Vary the hook: pain point, benefit, question, social proof.

title: Summarize financial reports
description: Turn dense financial data into executive summaries.
prompt_template: Summarize this financial report/data: [paste]. Provide: 1) Key findings in 3 bullet points 2) Notable trends 3) Recommended actions. Use plain language, avoid jargon.

title: Analyze variance in budgets
description: Identify and explain budget vs actual variances.
prompt_template: Here is budget vs actual: [paste data]. Identify the top 5 variances, explain likely causes, and suggest next steps for each.

title: Draft month-end close emails
description: Create standardized month-end communication templates.
prompt_template: Draft a month-end close reminder email to department heads. Include: deadlines, checklist items, who to contact for questions. Tone: professional, clear, concise.

title: Explain financial concepts simply
description: Get plain-language explanations of complex financial terms.
prompt_template: Explain [financial concept] in 2-3 sentences for a non-finance audience. Include a simple example.

title: Draft process documentation
description: Create step-by-step process docs from your notes.
prompt_template: Turn these notes into a clear process document: [paste]. Format: 1) Purpose 2) Prerequisites 3) Step-by-step instructions 4) Troubleshooting 5) Who to contact.

title: Summarize meeting notes
description: Transform raw meeting notes into actionable summaries.
prompt_template: Summarize these meeting notes: [paste]. Output: 1) Key decisions 2) Action items with owners 3) Open questions 4) Next steps.

title: Prioritize tasks from backlog
description: Get AI-assisted prioritization of your task list.
prompt_template: Here is my task backlog: [paste]. Criteria: [urgency, impact, dependencies]. Prioritize and suggest what to do first, with reasoning.

title: Draft job descriptions
description: Create job postings from role requirements.
prompt_template: Create a job description for [role]. Requirements: [paste]. Company: [brief description]. Include: title, summary, responsibilities, qualifications, benefits. Tone: inclusive, clear.

title: Prepare interview questions
description: Generate role-specific behavioral and situational questions.
prompt_template: Generate 8 interview questions for [role]. Mix: 3 behavioral, 3 situational, 2 role-specific. Include what to listen for in strong answers.

title: Draft policy language
description: Turn policy requirements into clear, compliant language.
prompt_template: Draft policy language for: [policy topic]. Requirements: [paste]. Must include: purpose, scope, procedure, exceptions. Tone: formal, clear, legally careful.

title: Create onboarding checklists
description: Generate structured onboarding plans for new hires.
prompt_template: Create a 30-day onboarding checklist for [role] at [company type]. Include: Day 1, Week 1, Week 2-4. Cover: tools, people, processes, goals.

title: Document technical processes
description: Create clear docs from technical notes or code.
prompt_template: Document this [process/code/setup]: [paste]. Format: 1) Overview 2) Prerequisites 3) Steps 4) Common issues 5) Related docs.

title: Write troubleshooting guides
description: Turn incident notes into reusable runbooks.
prompt_template: Create a troubleshooting guide from this incident: [paste]. Include: symptoms, root cause, resolution steps, prevention.

title: Add code comments
description: Generate clear comments for complex code sections.
prompt_template: Add clear comments to this code explaining what each section does and why: [paste code].

title: Summarize ticket history
description: Get quick context from long support ticket threads.
prompt_template: Summarize this support ticket: [paste]. Output: 1) Customer issue 2) What's been tried 3) Current status 4) Suggested next steps.

title: Draft response templates
description: Create consistent response templates for common issues.
prompt_template: Create 3 email response templates for: [issue type]. Tone: empathetic, helpful, clear. Include: acknowledgment, solution, next steps, sign-off.

title: Translate support content
description: Quickly translate support docs or responses.
prompt_template: Translate this support response to [language]. Keep the tone professional and empathetic. Preserve any links or formatting: [paste].

title: Summarize customer feedback
description: Turn raw feedback into actionable insights.
prompt_template: Analyze this customer feedback: [paste]. Identify: 1) Top 3 themes 2) Sentiment 3) Urgent issues 4) Suggested product/process improvements.

title: Draft professional emails
description: Compose clear, professional emails for any context.
prompt_template: Draft a professional email: [purpose]. Key points: [paste]. Tone: [formal/friendly]. Length: [short/medium]. Recipient: [description].

title: Summarize long documents
description: Get quick summaries of reports or articles.
prompt_template: Summarize this document in 5 bullet points. Highlight key decisions, numbers, and action items: [paste].

title: Organize meeting agendas
description: Structure scattered notes into a clear agenda.
prompt_template: Create a meeting agenda from these topics: [paste]. Include: objective, time allocation, discussion points, decisions needed.
